frames.caption: Three skiers stand on a snowy slope in front of a large sign reading 'AVORIAZ'. The backdrop features majestic snow-covered mountains under a clear blue sky.
frames.description: The scene is set on a ski slope in a mountainous region, likely a popular ski resort. Three individuals are equipped with skiing gear, posing for a photo in front of a prominent sign, with expansive mountain views in the background.

frames.caption: Two skiers in vibrant gear glide down a pristine snowy slope, leaving trails in the fresh powder. The expansive mountain range in the background is bathed in sunlight, creating a breathtaking alpine scene.
frames.description: The scene captures a dynamic moment of skiing in a mountainous region, with two individuals navigating a wide, snow-covered slope. The setting is a sunny day in the mountains, offering a clear view of the surrounding peaks.

summary: People: skiers. Nature: mountains, snow. Objects: ski poles, skis, sign, ski gear. Actions: posing, skiing, gliding. Emotions: joy, exhilaration. Scenes: ski resort, mountain landscape, alpine, outdoor sports. Concepts: winter sports, outdoor recreation, adventure
